item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and event scenes in Providence and Rhode Island.

This week's location is: Thames Waterside Grill & Bar on the water in Bristol RI!

Okay, THIS Labor Day we are mixing it up a bit:

  1. We are going to Bristol!

  2. We're starting earlier at 4pm since it's a holiday.

Where better to end a relaxing Labor Day weekend then overlooking the water and gorgeous boats than on beautiful Bristol Harbor?!  Thames Waterside has an amazing view of the harbor from the top deck where we can take advantage of the sunshine, water breezes and spectacular sunset while relaxing with good cheer and company on the "last" weekend of summer. If you've been, then you know and if not, then this place is definitely a good one to know about, especially if you've been looking for a relaxed place to take out-of-town friends and family for an on-the-water dining experience that's a little closer than Newport.

So, come down to Bristol this Monday (Labor Day) and let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Bring a friend!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a bright blue, gradated-dyed scarf, but we're hard to miss! We'll be upstairs on the deck.
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Thames Waterside Grill & Bar in Bristol!!!!
